scripts.test: yarn test:mobile && yarn test:tablet && yarn test:desktop
scripts.test:mobile: yarn cucumber --tags "@size-mobile or ((not @size-tablet) and (not @size-tablet) and not @size-desktop)"
scripts.test:tablet: yarn cucumber --tags "@size-tablet or ((not @size-tablet) and (not @size-tablet) and not @size-desktop)"
scripts.test:desktop: yarn cucumber --tags "@size-desktop or ((not @size-tablet) and (not @size-tablet) and not @size-desktop)"
